rows.label: tlk001801_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Tatezo will fix Kiku for sure,
mo! No matter how much time
or money it takes, mo!

rows.label: tlk001801_04_msg0002
rows.name:
If I leave her like this, I can
never face Dad Senzo again, mo!

rows.label: tlk001801_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Kiku! Just hold on a little
longer, mo! I'm going to
fix you right now, mo!

rows.label: tlk001801_04_msg0006
rows.name:
Sorry, but I am borrowing
your house, mo! I am using
it to repair Kiku, mo!

rows.label: tlk001801_04_msg0007
rows.name:
If it's for Kiku, use Tora's
house as much as you want, mo!

rows.label: tlk001801_04_msg0008
rows.name: That is a big help, mo.

rows.label: tlk001801_04_msg0009
rows.name:
It looks like it will be a while
before Kiku is moving again, but
I will definitely fix her, mo.

rows.label: tlk001801_04_msg0010
rows.name: You can do it, Dad, mo!

rows.label: tlk001801_04_msg0011
rows.name:
Tora will do his best not to
cause everyone trouble, mo!
